Event: To begin with,\nCity Y emerged with a population of 10 thousand
Then, it had 20 thousand citizens in 2015
Then, the mayor began to stimulate the economy
Then, more job were created and more immigrants came
Then, economic growth led to better healthcare\nand less death rate
Then, City Y has a population of 800 thousand
Then, experts predict that the population\nwill continue to increase
Then, the population will pass 2000 thousand by 2022
Then, the bigger population will\nmake the city keep expanding
Then, the population will\npass 4000 thousand by 2024
At last,\nit will become a giant city in 2025
